review_title: Nice little private college to work for...
job_title: IT Support Specialist in Pablo, MT
pros: Staff exceptional! I worked in the IT department as a work-study student and have no complaints about working there. I would go back there in a heartbeat if offered another role in any department.
cons: Some instructional staff in department were demeaning and pushy, or put demands on some projects that could not be completed in a reasonable time without assistance. However, those instructors are no longer there, so I have heard.

Students do not want to do work; administration is all about themselves & not about the students; disorganized; most in admin hired using nepotism; all promoted beyond their capability to function. Discrimination is also rampant, with tribal members being tribalist and disliking the "white" employees. FERPA and employee privacy laws are frequently broken and infractions are covered up. Poor communication between different areas resulting in more disorganization; don't take care of injured employees (know of several who have been thrown out like trash - one was a disabled woman who was attacked by a dog on campus). Have also heard about poor financial keeping with frequent false accounting being pushed through. The college no longer meets the vision and mission statement of the founding members. The computer platforms are annotated and obsolete and need updating. Storing all the company records on Google Cloud is not safe either. Worked there for several years and I am very relieved to have a position in another company away from the toxic atmosphere.

pros: Uses "Tribal Preference" hiring, located on reservation
Understanding of expectations, job duties clear, supervisors stellar
cons: Micromanagement...to the extreme and can be VERY distracting
